about_the_game:
Athralis Tower Defense is an exhilarating sci-fi tower defense game and the first installment in the Athralis franchise. In this game, you step into the role of the Strategic Orbital Defense System (S.O.D.S.) Commander for the Nexus Federation, humanity's last line of defense against a relentless alien threat known as The Athral Vanguard.

The Athral Vanguard is an insidious alien legion determined to eradicate humanity and claim Purandis Bay as their own. As the S.O.D.S. Commander, your mission is to strategically deploy manned turrets and cutting-edge equipment from orbit into critical zones under siege. Harness the power of orbital technology to outwit and overpower waves of alien invaders.

Key Features:

Strategic Deployment: Command and control a variety of manned turrets and advanced equipment from the safety of orbit. Place your defenses wisely to cover key areas and choke points.
Intense Sci-Fi Setting: Immerse yourself in a futuristic battlefield where humanity’s survival hinges on your tactical prowess.
Challenging Enemies: Face off against the Athral Vanguard, each with unique abilities and tactics that will test your strategic thinking.
Engaging Gameplay: Experience a blend of traditional tower defense mechanics with innovative orbital deployment strategies, making each level a unique challenge.
Expansive Storyline: Follow the gripping narrative of the Nexus Federation's struggle against the Athral Vanguard and uncover the mysteries behind their invasion.

Prepare for battle, Commander. The fate of humanity rests in your hands. Defend our world, obliterate the Athral Vanguard, and prove that the Strategic Orbital Defense System is an unstoppable force. Will you rise to the challenge and save humanity?

Internet Requirement: Requires internet to play

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7850 with 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
